Protect Your Home: Domestic Worker UIF & COIDA Registration

Complete compliance for private households. We register your domestic staff for UIF and help you issue compliant payslips.

Est. Turnaround: 2-5 Days
Total Fee
RÂ 850,00

Are you a Domestic Employer?

If you employ someone to work in your private household for more than 24 hours a month, you are legally an employer. This includes:

  • ðŸ§¹ Housekeepers / Cleaners
  • ðŸŒ³ Gardeners
  • ðŸ‘¶ Nannies & Au Pairs
  • ðŸš— Drivers

The Risk of Non-Compliance

Domestic workers often approach the CCMA upon dismissal. If they are not registered for UIF, the employer faces penalties, back-payments, and potential legal costs far exceeding the cost of registration. Domestic workers are fully covered by the Detailed Basic Conditions of Employment Act.

Protect Your Household

Register your employee for UIF today.

Start UIF Registration (R850)
